summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5502 for the improvement of Clogston Way, from Green Lake Way to the west line of Block 3, Wallingford's Division of Green Lake Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70297, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
